Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits motor vehicle manufacturers from using or disclosing certain consumer data
Summary: Prohibits motor vehicle manufacturers from using or disclosing to a third party any data regarding the driving behavior of consumers for use by a motor vehicle insurer.
LawCode: Add ยง198-d, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting motor vehicle manufacturers from using or disclosing certain consumer data
